name: Asteroid Belt
description:
The aim of the game...... Avoid the asteroids and dont run out of fuel........ How long will you survive?

The game starts off at phase 1 (easy) and becomes harder through phase 2-4. phase 5 is the hardest and just states survive.

UPDATE. BUG FIXES V1.2

Changelog

fixed bug where destroyed player with no fuel forces the wrong game over screen.
Fixed bug where asteroid 2 wouldnt destroy a ship with no fuel.

Improved collision
Asteroids now spawn at different angles.

Update V 1.4

Game now has no difficulty mode selection and instead gets progressively harder.
Game also features an offline leaderboard
